abstract: When TerraCycle, which creates recycling systems, expanded into a 20,000-square-foot warehouse, it designed the space with its culture and its business model in mind.
snippet: When TerraCycle, which creates recycling systems, expanded into a 20,000-square-foot warehouse, it designed the space with its culture and its business model in mind.

headline.main: A Recycling Company's New Office Reflects Its Ethic
